xwikidoc.title: Jetty Installation
xwikidoc.content: * Download and install [[Jetty>>http://jetty.codehaus.org/jetty/]]. It's usually as simple as unzipping it in a directory. Let's call this directory //[JETTY_HOME]//. * Extract the [[XWiki WAR>>xwiki:Main.Download]] into a directory named //xwiki// in //[JETTY_HOME]/webapps///. The reason you're expanding the WAR is because you'll need to modify one configuration file from inside the WAR later on when you configure the database access. * (Optional) If you want to modify the port on which Jetty will run, edit //[JETTY_HOME]/etc/jetty.xml//. Search for "8080" and replace it with the port value you wish to use.
